join-us.subheader: Sign up to share your songs with your community.

activate-account.subheader: Activate your account to complete your registration.

no-token.title: No Token
no-token.message: The link you used did not contain a token. Please click on the activation link in your email to activate your account, or proceed to login to request a new activation email.

activate-account-success.subheader: Your account has been activated. Please proceed to the login page to sign in with your account.

explore.subheader: Choose from a selection of stems, remix, original artists and remixer artists.

landing.title: OpenJam
landing.header: Like and Tip* your favorite artists
landing.subheader: Explore the new platform oriented Remix and Electronic Music before anyone else.
landing.bullet1: Support the artists and music you love
landing.bullet2: * Embrace hat-based remuneration in its digital version

not-found.subheader: Boo, looks like a ghost stole this page!

original-tracks.subheader: A stem is a group of audio sources mixed together, usually by one person, to be dealt with downstream as one unit.

remix-tracks.subheader: In music, a remix is a musical reconceptualization of a previously composed work.

share.subheader: Your latest musical favorites are on OpenJam.

login.subheader: Sign in to your OpenJam account.

register.gravatar: This app uses Gravatar so if you want a profile image, use a Gravatar email.
register.pin-info: Your 4 digit PIN will be required if you need to reset your password in the future. Please keep it somewhere safe.

register-thanks.subheader: Please check your email for an account activation link.
